meanings.sent1: She enjoys mimeoing worksheets for her students.
meanings.sent2: The office staff is mimeoing flyers for the event.
meanings.sent3: The mimeoing machine decided to take a break today.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a mimeoing machine, constantly churning out ideas.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the mimeoing machine filled the room with a rhythmic hum.

meanings.definition: The act or process of reproducing (printed material) by mimeograph.
meanings.sent1: The mimeoing of the school newsletter is done every Friday.
meanings.sent2: I watched the mimeoing of the play scripts in the drama club.
meanings.sent3: The mimeoing process seemed like magic to the students.
meanings.sent4: The mimeoing of memories onto paper brought nostalgia to the elderly woman.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the smell of ink during the mimeoing of the documents.
